backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing enquiries, orders, and user profiles with access control and admin retrieval functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and shared utility styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata and Google Fonts setup for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component enabling theme support, showing an intro overlay, and rendering the marketing landing page.
frontend/src/components/marketing/AboutS: Animated About section describing company history and displaying key statistics with gradient-styled headings.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Animated contact section with phone, email, and social links using IntersectionObserver and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Enquir: Interactive enquiry form with animated reveal, form submission via custom hook, and success message handling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer displaying branding, copyright, tagline, and a referral link with dynamic year and hostname.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Founde: Animated founders showcase featuring two profile cards with bios and scroll-triggered transitions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Galler: Image gallery with animated grid, modal viewer, and scroll-triggered visibility animations.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-based styling, smooth section scrolling, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Landing hero with headline, CTAs, and smooth-scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/marketing/IntroH: Animated helper dialog offering quick actions with dismiss handling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/OrderS: Order form with product preselection, submission handling, and success state.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Paymen: Payment info section listing features and CTAs to enquiry/contact.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Produc: Product grid with descriptions and order button that preselects products.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Services grid showcasing various signage services with reveal animation.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Vision: Marketing section that animates into view and displays the company’s vision and mission text with icons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhyCho: Animated marketing section listing four reasons to choose the company, each with an icon and description.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Wordma: Simple component rendering the brand wordmark with size variants and premium styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query mutations for submitting enquiries and orders through the backend actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color variables, themes, and utility classes for premium gradients and text effects.
frontend/src/lib/products.ts: Exports a product interface and a list of predefined product entries with names and descriptions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingLanding.tsx: Composes the full marketing landing page by stacking multiple section components with a header and footer.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL or hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, shadows, animations, and plugin extensions for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, requirements, issues, and design guidelines for the Gujrati Signage website build.
